display_long_description:
**I Am King** delivers an immersive VR adventure inspired by the legendary “sword in the stone.” Built specifically for Quest hand tracking, you’ll face the challenge of extracting a sword that grows ever longer and heavier each time a player triumphs. Pull it out, and you’ll be crowned the true ruler!

[media]

But competition is fierce—every success worldwide increases the sword’s difficulty for all challengers. Do you have the dexterity and determination to rise above the rest? Earn unique achievements as proof of your victory and showcase your newfound royal status to the world. Step into the realm of **I Am King** today and prove that you alone can wield the sword of legends!
